sentences.sContent: Its complexity degree can be quantitatively evaluated using fractal dimension that can describe geometrical irregularity.
sentences.sContent_eng: Its complexity degree can be quantitatively evaluated using fractal dimension that can describe geometrical irregularity.
sentences.sCn: 其复杂程度可以用描述几何不规则性的分维来定量评价。

sentences.sContent: Ten (10) instances of irregularity shall be taken Default Action with respect to that Location during any 12 consecutive months.
sentences.sContent_eng: Ten (10) instances of irregularity shall be taken Default Action with respect to that Location during any 12 consecutive months.
sentences.sCn: 连续12个月发生10次不规则行为构成违约，即连续12个月发生五次迟付款构成违约。

sentences.sContent: The topography of bullet surface wear was studied by using fractal theory. The irregularity and random distribution of its surface wear show the fractal characteristics.
sentences.sContent_eng: The topography of bullet surface wear was studied by using fractal theory. The irregularity and random distribution of its surface wear show the fractal characteristics.
sentences.sCn: 应用分形理论对弹头磨损表面形貌进行了研究，研究表明，其表面磨损形貌的不规则和随机分布性具有分形特征。

synos.tran: 不规则；无规律；[电子]不整齐

words.tran: 不规则的；无规律的；非正规的；不合法的
不规则物；不合规格的产品
